query: 如图,在△ABC中,AD是角平分线,AE是中线,CF⊥AD于点F,AC=5,AB=13,则EF的长为()选项：['\\frac{13}{5}', '\\frac{13}{4}', '3', '4']
answer: 解:延长CF交AB于G,如图所示:∵AD是△ABC的角平分线,∴∠GAF=∠CAF,在△AGF和△ACF中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠GAF=∠CAF}\\{AF=AF}\\{∠AFG=∠AFC=90^{°}}\end{array}\right.,∴△AGF≌△ACF(ASA),∴AG=AC=5,GF=CF,则BG=AB-AG=13-5=8．又∵AE是△ABC的中线,∴BE=CE,∴EF是△BCG的中位线,∴EF=\frac{1}{2}BG=4．故选:D．
